thread.title: Macron urges Europe to be more ambitious

title: Macron urges Europe to be more ambitious
text:
Macron urges Europe to be more ambitious 4:33pm BST - 00:45
French President Emmanuel Macron says Europe needs to be more ambitious whilst it deals with outside threats and resurgent nationalism, as he received the Charlemagne prize. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
